tiddlers.title: DemoCode
tiddlers.text:
// This just kills any attempt to ever runtw.run.updateTiddlerText('$Theme', 'DemoStyleSheet';
// if (tw.lib.tiddlerExists('DemoTiddler')) tw.run.showTiddler('DemoTiddler');

tiddlers.title: DemoTiddler
tiddlers.text:
This demo will import a [[DemoStyleSheet]] and apply it to the [[$Theme]].

A whole lotta text should now be green!
